Query:
SELECT
					ct.BankRetrievalReferenceNumber,
					tt.TransactionName,
					sctl.TransactionAmount,
					round(sctl.CalculatedCharge, 2),
					et1.EnumValue,
					et1.DisplayText,
					tt.LastUpdateTime,
					sctl.SourceMDN,
					sctl.Info1,
					bp.BillerCode,
					integration_summary.IntegrationType,
					sctl.InvoiceNo,
					ct.SourceCardPAN,
					ct.DestCardPAN,
					ct.BankCode
				FROM
					enum_text et1,
					service_charge_txn_log sctl 
					INNER JOIN commodity_transfer ct ON sctl.CommodityTransferID = ct.ID 
					INNER JOIN transaction_type tt ON tt.ID= sctl.TransactionTypeID 
					LEFT OUTER JOIN integration_summary ON sctl.ID = integration_summary.SctlId
					LEFT OUTER JOIN bill_payments bp ON bp.sctlId= sctl.ID
				WHERE 
					sctl.TransactionTypeID= tt.ID
					AND sctl.CreateTime >= ${StartTime}
					AND sctl.CreateTime < ${EndTime}
